div.p: VPRS 805/P000O/149/90-1169, inward and outward correspondence — subject, VA 913 Public Library of Victoria, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Let me thank you, dear Dr Gagliardi, for your kindness of bringing my wish before the trustees, and express my gratitude to the honored Gentlemen for the concession made.
See M to F. Gagliardi, 19 July 1890 (in this edition as 90-07-19a). I shall within the next few days select some more publications here for transmission to the public Library.
